body: As a virgin and woman respecter, I sympathize with the poor guy. Where’s the line between rape and consent when you’re supposed to pick up on subtle hints. Are they really just a friend or do they want something more. If I cross that line will I make it to the next step or ruin a relationship forever. Am I getting pussy or 10 years in jail? So many guys are put into stressful predicaments like this. Unfortunately in real life there’s no omniscient narrator to guide, and people may end up picking wrong. Luckily here we just get to jack off in a dark room and watch as the scene unfolds without sweating the details because that’s how fiction works
